scripts.build: cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.client: cd client && powershell -Command "$env:NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider'; npx react-scripts start"
scripts.dev:cmd: start cmd /k "cd server && npm run start" && start cmd /k "cd client && set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx react-scripts start"
scripts.dev: start powershell -ArgumentList "-NoExit", "cd server; npm start" && start powershell -ArgumentList "-NoExit", "cd client; $env:NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider'; npx react-scripts start"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.vercel-build: npm run install-all && npm run build
